basics.name: Yaqin Hasan
basics.label: Full-stack software engineer specialising in cloud-native SaaS applications.
basics.summary: Full-stack engineer with production experience across the UI, API and infrastructure layers. Proven track record of shipping impactful features - from AI-powered workflows to third-party integrations and billing systems.

work.name: Cambridge Kinetics
work.summary: Worked across frontend, backend and infrastructure to build and maintain a production-grade SaaS business management platform.
highlights: Developed features across the full stack using Vue 3, C#/ASP.NET Core, HotChocolate GraphQL, and MongoDB.
Built AI-powered workflow features using LLMs, reducing system configuration and data entry time from hours to seconds.
Expanded existing REST API to efficiently support bulk operations on 10,000+ records.
Developed a real-time data syncing service between multiple external systems, processing thousands of daily updates across varied schemas and authentication schemes.
Enhanced existing Stripe billing integration to support flexible usage-based billing.
Built integrations with third-party accounting systems including Xero and QuickBooks, handling OAuth, webhooks and API errors robustly.
Built and maintained CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions on local and cloud runners, and managed production deployments on Microsoft Azure.
Mentored graduate and junior engineers through code review, pair programming, and onboarding onto complex areas of the codebase.
